body:
Is that possible to measure ASE and SDA without using Daysim? If so, how it
is possible? I actually want to learn the steps to measure these two
metrics in Radiance or RAdiance-Daysim.


On Wed, Mar 25, 2015 at 1:29 PM, Sepideh Korsavi <sepidehkorsavi at gmail.com>
